caseStudyDescription.caseStudyDescription: Experience strategy providing a north star for a major retailer

caseStudyContent.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I worked with a large electronics retailer to help them understand the future of commerce and opportunities for them to adapt their business model during and after the COVID-19 pandemic. As the experience strategist I ran a diary study, oversaw qual research, collaboraed with quant teams to test specific service elements and jobs-to-be-done, ran design sprints, and produced our strategy brief. Through the process, our team of 8 identified key opportunities and collaborated with client teams to arrive at a vision for the future. The work informed the trial of store format concepts, new digital services, and investment in data operations.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
